amendment.description: An amendment numbered 131 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude oil and gas leasing in the Great Lakes from the plan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude oil and gas leasing in the Great Lakes from the plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 215 (Roll no. 64).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Schneider.
